Uses of Class
com.svincent.wam.WamObject

Packages that use WamObject
com.svincent.wam An implementation of a Warren's Abstract Machine and associated builtin predicates, to conform to ISO Prolog.

          A compoundTerm is a Prolog tree constant (normally of the form f(x1, x2, ..., xn), where f is known as the compoundTerm's functor, and x1 through xn are known as the term's subterms.
